thread.title: Full list of newly elected members of GFA National Executive Commitee
thread.title_full: Full list of newly elected members of GFA National Executive Commitee

title: Full list of newly elected members of GFA National Executive Commitee
text:
15:42 CET Full list of newly elected members of GFA National Executive Commitee By Ghana FA 
The GFA National Executive Committee elections have ended with 22-members duly elected to represent the Constituent bodies, Premier and Division One and the various Regional Football Associations for the next four years. 
All newly elected Executive Committee members will be sworn in at the upcoming Ordinary GFA Congress which will be held next month. 
Below are the newly elected National Executive Committee members of the GFA: 
1. MR. KWESI NYANTAKYI -GFA President2. MADAM LEANIER ADDY - Constituent Bodies3. GEORGE AKWASI AFRIYIE - Premier League4. DELALI ERIC SENAYE - Premier League5. ALBERT COMMEY ARYEETEY - Premier League6. SAMUEL OPOKU NTI - Premier League7. FRANK NWOKOLO NELSON - Premier League8. NAB BENJAMIN EYISON - Premier League9. KURT E.S. OKRAKU - Division One10. WILFRED OSEI KWAKU - Division One11. JOHN FREDERICK MENSAH - Division One12. KWEKU ABAKA EYIAH - Division One13. ABDULAI ALHASSAN - Chairman, Northern Regional FA 
14. ALHAJI DAUDI SADUGU – Chairman, Upper West Regional FA 
15. MR. SALIFU ZIDA – Chairman, Upper East Regional FA 
16. MR. AUGUSTINE ASANTE - Chairman, Brong Ahafo Regional FA 
17. MR. OSEI TUTU AGYEMAN – Chairman, Ashanti Regional FA 
18. MR. A.A. GANIYU LAWAL – Chairman, Eastern Regional FA 
19. MR. KOJO YANKAH – Chairman, Western Regional FA 
20. MR. ROY ARTHUR – Chairman, Central Regional FA21. NII KORMEITE DOKU – Chairman, Greater Accra Regional FA 
22. MR. FRANCIS DOGBATSE – Chairman, Volta Regional FA
